languages.text: "Высокому фактотуму стоит поменьше переживать, это вредно для его маленького клеветнического сердечка, гоняющего кровь в этой неблагодарной туше. Но я поражена, что он не переживал раньше, когда осыпал меня щедрыми дарами с первой минуты моего пребывания на корабле. Конечно, я не буду обвинять его в том, что так он рассчитывал купить мое благоволение..."

"The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."
languages.original_text: "Высокому фактотуму стоит поменьше переживать, это вредно для его маленького клеветнического сердечка, гоняющего кровь в этой неблагодарной туше. Но я поражена, что он не переживал раньше, когда осыпал меня щедрыми дарами с первой минуты моего пребывания на корабле. Конечно, я не буду обвинять его в том, что так он рассчитывал купить мое благоволение..."

languages.text: “高阶顾问应该少担心些才对。他那坨忘恩负义的烂肉里，藏着一颗流淌着诽谤毒液的小心脏，过于忧虑这对他的心脏不好。不过，他现在突然担心起来了，这还真让我意外。毕竟，我刚上船的时候，他就送给我各种各样的奢华礼物。当然了，虽然他打算靠收买赢得我的好感，但我并不打算指控他的行为……”
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

traits.locale_text: “高阶顾问应该少担心些才对。他那坨忘恩负义的烂肉里，藏着一颗流淌着诽谤毒液的小心脏，过于忧虑这对他的心脏不好。不过，他现在突然担心起来了，这还真让我意外。毕竟，我刚上船的时候，他就送给我各种各样的奢华礼物。当然了，虽然他打算靠收买赢得我的好感，但我并不打算指控他的行为……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ハイ・ファクトタムは心配し過ぎだね…恩知らずの死骸にばかり血を送り続ける、人を中傷するような小心者には良くないことだよ。でも、あたしが乗船した途端に彼はあたしに贈り物をしてくれたんだけどね。その時には不安じゃなかったのは驚きだ。もちろん、彼があたしの好意を買おうとしてただなんて非難するつもりはないけどさ…」
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

traits.locale_text: 「ハイ・ファクトタムは心配し過ぎだね…恩知らずの死骸にばかり血を送り続ける、人を中傷するような小心者には良くないことだよ。でも、あたしが乗船した途端に彼はあたしに贈り物をしてくれたんだけどね。その時には不安じゃなかったのは驚きだ。もちろん、彼があたしの好意を買おうとしてただなんて非難するつもりはないけどさ…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Al Sumo Factótum le convendría preocuparse menos. Le va a dar algo en ese corazón calumniador que bombea sangre por su desagradecido cuerpo. También me sorprende que no estuviera preocupado antes, cuando me hizo numerosos regalos espectaculares en cuanto subí a bordo. No voy a acusarle de querer comprar mi favor, pero...».
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

traits.locale_text: «Al Sumo Factótum le convendría preocuparse menos. Le va a dar algo en ese corazón calumniador que bombea sangre por su desagradecido cuerpo. También me sorprende que no estuviera preocupado antes, cuando me hizo numerosos regalos espectaculares en cuanto subí a bordo. No voy a acusarle de querer comprar mi favor, pero...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Le haut factotum devrait essayer de s'inquiéter un peu moins ; c'est mauvais pour le petit cœur médisant qui fait tourner le sang dans sa carcasse ingrate. Mais je suis surprise d'apprendre qu'il ne s'inquiétait pas jusque-là, au vu des généreux cadeaux que lui-même m'a offerts à mon arrivée à bord. Bien entendu, je ne l'accuse pas là d'avoir cherché à s'acheter mes faveurs... »
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

traits.locale_text: « Le haut factotum devrait essayer de s'inquiéter un peu moins ; c'est mauvais pour le petit cœur médisant qui fait tourner le sang dans sa carcasse ingrate. Mais je suis surprise d'apprendre qu'il ne s'inquiétait pas jusque-là, au vu des généreux cadeaux que lui-même m'a offerts à mon arrivée à bord. Bien entendu, je ne l'accuse pas là d'avoir cherché à s'acheter mes faveurs... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Das Hoch-Faktotum sollte sich weniger Sorgen machen – denn das ist nicht gut für sein verleumderisches kleines Herz, das Blut in seinen undankbaren Kadaver pumpt. Aber warum war er nicht besorgt, als er mir bei meiner Ankunft an Bord diverse großzügige Geschenke machte? Natürlich werde ich ihn nicht beschuldigen, dass er sich meine Gunst erkaufen wollte ..."
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

Aber warum war er nicht besorgt, als er mir bei meiner Ankunft an Bord diverse großzügige Geschenke machte? Natürlich werde ich ihn nicht beschuldigen, dass er sich meine Gunst erkaufen wollte ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Arşıkâhya, daha az endişelenmeyi denemeli. Onun o nankör vücuduna kan pompalayan minik, iftiracı kalbinin sağlığına iyi gelmez. Ama gemiye adım attığım anda beni cömert armağanlara boğarken edişelenmemiş olmasına şaşırmadığımı söyleyemeyeceğim. Elbette onu para saçarak gözüme girmeye çalışmakla itham etmeyeceğim..."
languages.original_text: "The High Factotum should try to worry less — it's not good for the slanderous little heart that pumps blood around his ungrateful carcass. But I am surprised he was not worried before, when he showered me with generous gifts the moment I arrived on board. Of course, I will not accuse him of trying to buy my favour..."

traits.locale_text: "Arşıkâhya daha az endişelenmeyi denemeli. Onun o nankör vücuduna kan pompalayan minik, iftiracı kalbinin sağlığına iyi gelmez. Ama gemiye adım attığım anda beni cömert armağanlara boğarken edişelenmemiş olmasına şaşırmadığımı söyleyemeyeceğim. Elbette onu para saçarak gözüme girmeye çalışmakla itham etmeyeceğim..."
